Stay in touch with your body
Skin contact is the key to an accurate readings\n\nWear GoBe 1–2 finger widths above your wrist bone. The tightening should be firm, but still comfortable
Contact is the key
The power to change

GoBe full charge takes 90 min

Here is our recipe of ideal charging:
Charge before going to sleep or after waking up

Wear the band at least 30 min before having a meal
